scripts.publish:button-vanilla-extract: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/button-vanilla-extract && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:button-linaria: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/button-linaria && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:button-css-modules: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/button-css-modules && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:theme: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/theme && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:vanilla-extract-theme: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/vanilla-extract-theme && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:linaria-theme: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/linaria-theme && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:css-modules-theme: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/css-modules-theme && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:button-linaria-styled: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/button-linaria-styled && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:button-tailwind: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/button-tailwind && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:tailwind-theme: npm run prepare:publish && cd dist/packages/tailwind-theme && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:all: npm run build:all && npm run bump:versions && npm run prepare:publish && npm run publish:button-vanilla-extract && npm run publish:button-linaria && npm run publish:button-linaria-styled && npm run publish:button-css-modules && npm run publish:button-tailwind && npm run publish:theme && npm run publish:vanilla-extract-theme && npm run publish:linaria-theme && npm run publish:css-modules-theme && npm run publish:tailwind-theme
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:all && npm run prepare:publish
